abstract: Kuwaiti officials identify Saudi Arabian citizen Fahd Suleiman Abdul-Mohsen al-Qabaa as man who carried out suicide bombing on Shiite mosque that killed 27 people and wounded more than 200; authorities also arrest driver of car that dropped bomber off and owner of house where driver was hiding; Islamic State extremists claim responsibility for attack as well as deadly strike on Tunisian beach resort.
lead_paragraph: The man who killed 27 people was a Saudi Arabian citizen who arrived in the nation just hours before blowing himself up, the Kuwaiti Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Kuwait Identifies Suicide Bomber in Mosque Attack
headline.print_headline: Bomber Is Identified in Attack in Kuwait

snippet: The man who killed 27 people was a Saudi Arabian citizen who arrived in the nation just hours before blowing himself up, the Kuwaiti Interior Ministry said.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
